entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 04:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
